meanings.sent1: The veeps attended the meeting with the president.
meanings.sent2: The veeps play an important role in the government.
meanings.sent3: The veeps joked about their busy schedules.
meanings.sent4: The veeps are like the right-hand people to the president.
meanings.sent5: The veeps are next in line after the president.

meanings.definition: To serve as a vice president
meanings.sent1: She veeps for a large company in the city.
meanings.sent2: He veeps with dedication and loyalty.
meanings.sent3: The team veeps for a new leader to be chosen.
meanings.sent4: The candidate veeps for the opportunity to make a difference.
meanings.sent5: They veeps diligently to support the president.
